body.para: On Wed, 6 Nov 2002 22:43, Sander Striker wrote:

quote.quotepara: Seriously, we have a SCM to find out who wrote what. @author tags are misleading to say the least. The entire concept just asks for people that are going to see in how many places they can get their name.

body.para: The best I have seen so far is a committer forking a project so he can add his name as an @author - would have been funny except that it effectively blocked progress in that project.
